content.query:
Use [Clients]
GO
SELECT 
    JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.firstname') as firstname,
    JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.lastname') as lastname,
    doc
from OPENROWSET
(
    BULK 'abfss://medstarrfpdatalakefs@medstarrfpdatalakeeastus.dfs.core.windows.net/clients/Clients.json',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
) WITH 
(
    doc varchar(MAX) 
) as rows
